data.price: Kuma waɗanda suke idan sun ciyar, bã su yin ɓarna, kuma bã su yin ƙwauro, kuma (ciyarwarsu) sai ta kasance a tsakãnin wancan da tsakaitãwa.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُواْ لَمۡ يُسۡرِفُواْ وَلَمۡ يَقۡتُرُواْ وَكَانَ بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامٗا

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā anfaqū lam yus'rifū walam yaqturū wakāna bayna dhālika qawāman

dua.name: Dua for Balanced Living
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance in maintaining balance between spiritual devotion and worldly responsibilities, advocating a moderate lifestyle.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
